mapper.select: SELECT id, email, name, profile_image_url, provider, provider_id, created_at, updated_at FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, name, profile_image_url, provider, provider_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{name}, #{profileImageUrl}, #{provider}, #{providerId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{name}, profile_image_url = #{profileImageUrl}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
